identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer

principles: Fusion: Finance Security x Cyberpunk Rebellion
Content: Data is the hero, treat it like encrypted intel

scanlines.css: background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(255,255,255,0), rgba(255,255,255,0) 50%, rgba(0,0,0,0.2) 50%, rgba(0,0,0,0.2)); background-size: 100% 4px; pointer-events: none; position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; z-index: 50; opacity: 0.15;

glitch_effect.instruction: Use simple CSS keyframes for hover states on buttons to shift the background slightly.

layout_strategy.spacing: Generous padding (p-6, p-8) inside containers to allow for 'breathing room' and glow effects.

CardList.description: A high-tech data grid. Not a standard table.
CardList.row_style: bg-cyber-gray border-l-2 border-transparent hover:border-neon-cyan transition-all duration-300 hover:shadow-neon-cyan hover:translate-x-1

CreditCard3D.description: The hero component. A realistic 3D flip card.
CreditCard3D.inner_classes: relative w-full h-full transition-all duration-700 transform-style-3d group-hover:rotate-y-180
CreditCard3D.front_classes: absolute w-full h-full backface-hidden bg-gradient-to-br from-gray-900 to-black border border-white/20 rounded-xl p-6 flex flex-col justify-between shadow-2xl
CreditCard3D.back_classes: absolute w-full h-full backface-hidden rotate-y-180 bg-gradient-to-br from-gray-900 to-black border border-neon-pink/50 rounded-xl p-6 flex flex-col justify-center items-center shadow-neon-pink

assets.chip: Use a gold/silver gradient div for the chip.
assets.logo: Use a simple text logo or icon.

ViewButton.style: bg-transparent border border-neon-cyan text-neon-cyan hover:bg-neon-cyan hover:text-black font-orbitron uppercase tracking-widest transition-all duration-300 shadow-[0_0_10px_rgba(0,243,255,0.3)] hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(0,243,255,0.6)]

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install dependencies: `npm install framer-motion lucide-react` (or yarn add).
2. Update `tailwind.config.js` with the colors and box-shadows defined above.
3. Add the Google Fonts import to `index.css`.
4. Create a `Layout` component that includes the 'Scanlines' overlay.
5. Build the `CreditCard` component using the `preserve-3d` CSS technique. Ensure `backface-visibility: hidden` is used.
6. The 'View Card' action should open a Modal (Dialog) where the 3D card is displayed large and centered.
8. Ensure all text contrast meets accessibility standards (Neon on Black is usually good, but check thin fonts).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use gradients for text unless it is a very large heading.
Avoid 'flat' design. Cyberpunk needs depth (glows, shadows, layers).
Make sure the 'Flip' animation is smooth (0.6s - 0.8s).
The 'CVV' on the back should be clearly visible when flipped.
